Loading required libraries

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(rio)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(reshape2)
library(rbokeh)
library(xtable)
```

Set default directory
```{r}
setwd("~/code/EntropyStableFD/bin")
```

##Plot of single series:
Read data
```{r}
data = import('test_1_400.txt')
```
Plot:
```{r}
ggplot(data=data, aes(x=X, y=MS)) +
  geom_line()+geom_point()
```

##Plot multiple series
Reshape database:
```{r}
melted <- melt(data, id="X")
```
Add reference solution:
```{r}
ref = import('test_1_reference.txt')
```
Plot:
```{r}
figure(data= melted) %>%
  ly_points(X, value, glyph = variable, color= variable, size=5) %>%
  ly_lines(x, REF, data = ref, legend = "REF")
```

N = length(errores)
